original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 13.1. Kusalattika
analyzed: kusalattika

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Namo tassa Bhagavato Arahato Sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—kusale khandhe paṭicca
analyzed: kusalam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā akusale khandhe paṭicca

original: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ. Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—kusalaṁ
analyzed: citta samuṭṭhānam rūpa kusalam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccaya akusala

original: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: ekam khandham paṭicca tayaḥ khandhāḥ citta samuṭṭhānañca rūpam pe kusalam dhamma

original: paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo
analyzed: paṭicca na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccaya akusalam ekam khandham paṭicca tayo

original: khandhā …pe… kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: khandhāḥ pe kusalam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ ca na abyākataḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti

original: hetupaccayā— kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: hetu paccayā kusalam ekam khandham paṭicca tayaḥ khandhā pe kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—kusale khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
analyzed: na kusalaḥ ca na akusalaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccaya akusale khandhe paṭicca citta samuṭṭhānam rūpa

original: Akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—akusale khandhe paṭicca
analyzed: akusalam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā akusale khandhe paṭicca

original: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ. Akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—akusalaṁ
analyzed: citta samuṭṭhānam rūpa akusalam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā akusala

original: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… akusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: ekam khandham paṭicca tayaḥ khandhāḥ citta samuṭṭhānañca rūpam pe akusalam dhamma

original: paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
analyzed: paṭicca na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā akusalam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ

original: ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
analyzed: ca na abyākataḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā akusalam dhammam paṭicca na kusalo

original: ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca na akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vipākābyākataṁ kiriyābyākataṁ
analyzed: abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā vipāka abyākatam kiriyā abyākata

original: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
analyzed: ekam khandham paṭicca tayo khandhāḥ citta samuṭṭhānam ca rūpam pe paṭisandhi kkhaṇe

original: …pe… ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā …pe… dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā,
analyzed: pe ekam mahābhūtam paṭicca tayaḥ mahābhūtā pe dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā

original: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ. Abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo
analyzed: mahābhūte paṭicca citta samuṭṭhānam rūpa abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā—vipākābyākataṁ …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… mahābhūtaṁ …pe… abyākataṁ
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccaya avipāka abyākatam pe paṭisandhi khaṇe pe mahābhūtam pe abyākata

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vipākābyākataṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na kusalo ca na akusalo ca dhammāḥ uppajjanti hetu paccaya avipāka abyākata

original: kiriyābyākataṁ …pe…. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: kiriyā byākatam saṅkhitta

original: Kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— kusale
analyzed: kusalam ca abyākatam ca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā kusale

original: khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ. Kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṁ
analyzed: khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca citta samuṭṭhānam rūpa kusalañca abyākatañca dhamma

original: paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: paṭicca na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam ca abyākatam ca dhammam paṭicca

original: nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalo ca na akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalañca
analyzed: akusalañca abyākatañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā akusalañca

analyzed: abyākatam ca dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā akusalañca abyākatañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Cittasamuṭṭhānarūpameva
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ ca na akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā citta samuṭṭhāna rūpam eva

original: ettha vattati, ekūnavīsati pañhā kātabbā.)
analyzed: ettha vattati ekūnavīsati pañhā kātabbā

analyzed: ārammaṇa

analyzed: pañhāvāra

analyzed: hetu ārammaṇa

analyzed: hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa adhipatiyā sattarasa anantare soḷasa samanantare

analyzed: soḷasa sahajāte ekūnavīsa aññamaññe nava nissaye chabbīsa upanissaye aṭṭhārasa

original: purejāte cha, pacchājāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme terasa, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre terasa
analyzed: purejāte cha pacchājāte nava āsevane nava kamme terasa vipāke tīṇi āhāre terasa

original: …pe… magge terasa, sampayutte nava, vippayutte dvādasa …pe… avigate chabbīsa. (Pañhāvāraṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
